# VNFaceObservationAccepting

**Protocol**

An image analysis request that operates on face observations.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol VNFaceObservationAccepting : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

This protocol allows you to provide an input collection of [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNFaceObservation] objects as part of a request. Request objects adopt this protocol to request additional information about detected faces, such as facial landmarks.

## Providing Face Observations

- **inputFaceObservations**: An array of [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNFaceObservation] objects to process as part of the request.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Conforming Types

- VNDetectFaceCaptureQualityRequest
- VNDetectFaceLandmarksRequest
